results.name: a(n) is the least step for the Sankt-Petrus-game with n white and n black stones.
comment: Beginning at the position A187789(n) with step a(n), (n-1) white stones were eliminated; then from the position 1 of the last white stone, n black stones were eliminated.
reference: W. Ahrens, Das Josephusspiel, Archiv für Kulturgeschichte, Jg 11(1913), 129-151.
R. Baumann, Computer Knobelei, LOG IN, Heft 165(2010), 68-71.
link: Index entries for sequences related to the Josephus Problem
example: n=4; WBWWBBWB; startposition=A187789(4)=8; least step=a(4)=4; elimination: white stones: {3,7,4}; black stones: {6,5,8,2}.
